data.meta_description: Paper, offset lithography. - 1972 - Condition: Fine, light creases. - Size: A1 1 Sheet (cca. 59 x 84 cm). WUSA is a 1970 American drama film directed by Stuart Rosenberg It was written by Robert Stone based on his novel A Hall of Mirrors The cast included Paul Newman Joanne Woodward Anthony Perkins Laurence Harvey Cloris Leachman and Wayne Rogers Rheinhardt a cynical drifter gets a job as an announcer for right wing radio station WUSA in New Orleans Rheinhardt is content to parrot WUSA s reactionary editorial stance on the air even if he does not agree with it Rheinhardt finds his cynical detachment challenged by a lady friend Geraldine and by Rainey a neighbor and troubled idealist who becomes aware of WUSA s sinister hidden purpose And when events start spinning out of control even Rheinhardt finds he must take a stand wikipedia org The designer of the poster rp d Darvas is one of the most important poster artists in the generation that started in the 1950s He was a pioneer who renewed poster art with his new techniques and styles This surrealistic composition with a snake and its microphone head is a good example of Darvas works in the 1970s when the colourful pop art period was replaced by a surrealist poster style comprised of pencil drawings and a few colours - WUSA

Terms of Sale:

Welcome to our website! Here are a few frequently asked questions about our inventory and ordering. If you have any questions, please let us know!

How can I buy a poster or other items listed on the website?

The best way to order from us is to send an e-mail to info@budapestposter.com. We will contact you shortly, and provide all necessary information about the posters you wish to buy as well as the details of the purchase and the delivery.

Another way to purchase from us is personally, in the g...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Shipping & handling

When you decide which poster you would like to purchase, contact us by e-mail to discuss every related details, including shipping. We ship the item(s) by FedEx International Priority Shipping.

Shipping costs 20-30 USD for small items shipped in Fedex Paks and 30-40 USD for posters packed in tubes and Fedex triangle tubes.

Insurance is optional and commands an extra fee.

Some orders might need special packaging, insurance or other to fulfill which might result in higher shipping costs.

After receiving full payment, we ship the item(s) in 2 business day in most cases. If shipping takes most time for some unexpected reason, we will contact you and will keep you updated.

The posters are carefully packed and shipped in protective paper sheets then put in round tubes then placed in triangle-shaped tubes provided by FedEx, and then closed by adhesive tape.
